Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Authorizes the county of Cortland to impose a tax on real estate transfers
Summary: Authorizes the county of Cortland to impose a tax of one dollar per five hundred dollars on real estate transfers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the county of Cortland to impose a tax on real estate transfers; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
